pages.text: The $(mob)Flesh Lich$() is a monster that spawns deep underground in the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. It attacks players on sight with ranged fireball attacks. Although it is undead and subsequently vulnerable to $(thing)Smite$() enchantments and sunlight, the $(mob)Flesh Lich$() is resistant to Fire.
$(mob)Flesh Liches$() drop $(item)Ore Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random ore found in the $(thing)Overworld$().
$(mob)The Flesh Lich$() can drop a $(item)Zombie Head$() on death.
